
set.seed(1000)

x <- c(rnorm(10, mean = 5, sd = 0.5), rnorm(10, mean = 2, sd = 0.5))
y <- c(rnorm(10, mean = 5, sd = 0.5), rnorm(10, mean = 2, sd = 0.5))
z <- c(rep( 1, 10), rep(-1, 10))
data_svm <- data.frame("x" = x, "y" = y, "z" = z)

plot(x = data_svm[,1],
     y = data_svm[,2],
     xlim = c(0, 6),
     ylim = c(0, 6),
     main = "2-Dimensional Example",
     pch = 5,
     col = "#4E9A06")

library(e1071)
Class <- as.factor(data_svm[,3])

svmfit1 <- svm(z ~ .,
               data = data_svm,
               kernel = "linear")

plot(svmfit1, data_svm)
